rcpp_distSTRING

Source: R/RcppExports.R
rcpp_distSTRING.Rd

calcualtes pairwise distances using a score matrix

rcpp_distSTRING(dnavector, scoreMatrix, ncores = 1L)

Arguments

dnavector

StringVector
scoreMatrix

NumericMatrix
ncores

number of cores

Value

list

Author

Kristian K Ullrich

Examples

## load example sequence data
data("hiv", package="distSTRING")
rcpp_distSTRING(dnavector=as.character(hiv), scoreMatrix=iupacMatrix())
